that's also made worse if you're outside and the cold,

11,608 votes for Simon,
11,607 votes for Yancey.

Before the Virginia elections, Republicans held a 66 - 34 majority,

that a reality was for the recount to be certified, and that did not happen.
And the reason for that is there was a questionable ballot.
A ballot where someone had filled in the bubble for both Simons and Yancy.

every other Republican on the ticket.

And then let's talk about the accusations against T.J. Miller. The accuser,
who's remaining anonymous but The Daily Beast is calling Sarah, says that she and Miller began dating
in fall of 2001. A few months into their relationship, she recalled having a lot to drink.
She recalled having a lot to drink. She admitted that there are parts of the incident she doesn't remember,
and she stressed that it was important to her to cop to that, saying
"I'm not interested in forcing a pretend a memory on anyone...15 years later, I remained terrified of accusing
someone of something they didn't do, but I have a visual and physical memory of that."
She said she had a distinct memory of them beginning to fool around, but then Miller began shaking her
violently, and then punched her in the mouth during sex. She said she woke up the next morning with a fractured
tooth and a bloody lip. When she asked Miller what had happened, he claimed she fell. According to her, they still
continued seeing each other. Saying "I couldn't bring myself at the time to believe this had happened.
It was me not wanting it to be true."
Also, saying she had lost her virginity to Miller, and that she felt especially connected with him.
But then she recalls another night where she met up with Miller at a party. They went back to her apartment and
she says, "We started to fool around and very early in that he put his hands around my throat and closed them,
and I couldn't breathe. I was genuinely terrified and completely surprised.
I understand now that this is for some people a kink, and I continue to believe it is something that should be
entered into by consenting parties, but as someone who had only begun having sexual encounters like about three months earlier,
I had no awareness this was a kink, and I had certainly not entered into any agreement that I would be choked.
I was fully paralyzed."
Then saying at this point her roommates came to check on her. In response to them asking if she was okay,
she said 'I don't know I'll talk to you in the morning.'
She then said this situation with T.J. Miller continued, saying, "He anally penetrated me without my consent.
Which I actually believed at that point I cried out like, 'no' and he didn't continue to do that-
but he also had a beer bottle with him the entire time.
He used the bottle at one point to penetrate me without my consent."
Adding that she wasn't prepared, and that she didn't want to believe it was happening.
Then saying that after Miller left the apartment she confided in her roommates about what happened.
Two of her roommates also corroborated this story. One remaining anonymous.
The other, her roommate Katie Duff. She talked about fighting sounds and banging and loud, violent sounds,
saying she recalled seeing bruises.

I'll include the full statement in the links down below, but here the highlights.
"We met this woman over a decade ago while studying together in college.
